Text: Parallels 7 (available here for quite a while) also works fine on Lion; Little Snitch OR activation blocker takes care of it, but both are not needed. Why post this older version for Lion users when the newest version of 7 is only about half a screen down and works just fine on Lion? Nobody who can run Lion would need 6 over 7.

pryingeyes this only proves that TPB only gives morons and spammers skulls so they can post dupes like retards. Specific PD6 versions are already shared. Who the fuck even knows what outdated version this old shite is.

No funciona con el serial que tienes!
Alguna ayuda?
Lighten up!  He posted a version that works on his Lion machine.  If you don't like it, go elsewhere!
